about_the_game:
Explore ruined cathedrals, hidden passageways, and crystal-covered landscapes as you face relentless enemies that will test your skill, precision, and strategy. Every battle is a challenge that rewards mastery, while exploration unveils fragments of a dark and fascinating story told through the environment.

With a unique artistic direction and a soundtrack that highlights mystery and tension, Zenith aims to immerse players in an experience that evokes emotions like solitude, triumph, and awe for the unknown.

Prepare to face the darkness, push your limits, and uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows. Will you dare to take the first step?

Play as Zenith a falled goddess

  • Fast spacing combat

    Fight different types of enemies and challenge your skills. From simple enemies to difficult bosses.

  • Get New Skills

    In Zenith you will get new gear and skills to help you get through the game 

  • Level Up and Upgrade your character

    You can custom your skills and upgrade your character to fit your needs.

  • Solve Puzzles and get rewards

    Different types of puzzles to challenge.

  • Explore the world

    Get into a fascinating and Mysterious world full of secrets.

content_descriptors.notes: Fights and blood. We dont touch other elements like, alchohol, sex and drugs.

short_description: Step into a dark and decaying world with Zenith, an Action RPG that blends intense combat, deep exploration, and an immersive atmosphere. Explore ruined cathedrals and gothic landscapes filled with secrets, facing relentless enemies that will challenge your skill and strategy.
